post.desc: So I just the checked out the [culprit dialogue](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Mountain_of_Faith/Story/Reimu%27s_Scenario#Stage_4) that boosted this pairing. The conventional interpretation is probably that Aya being the one who knows Reimu best ***among the tengu***. But of course, that is more than enough to work with lmao.
